name: Bit9
description:
To win you need intuition, fast fingers and a good spatial perception.

Collect all the objects in the room in the shortest possible time.

Tap the screen when the ball is above the arrow that would change the direction of its movement.

Google Play: http://goo.gl/k2Jk6d
Amazon Store: http://goo.gl/HsBBiY
SlideMe Market: https://goo.gl/ibytsq
